contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement | |official_name = Coward, South Carolina |settlement_type = [[Town]] |nickname = |image_skyline = |imagesize = |image_caption = |image_flag = |image_seal = |image_map = SCMap-doton-Coward.PNG |mapsize = 250px |map_caption = Location of Coward in<br>South Carolina |incorporated= |image_map1 = |mapsize1 = |map_caption1 = |coordinates_region = US-SC |subdivision_type = [[List of countries|Country]] |subdivision_type1 = [[Political divisions of the United States|State]] |subdivision_type2 = [[List of counties in South Carolina|County]] |subdivision_name = [[United States]] |subdivision_name1 = [[South Carolina]] |subdivision_name2 = [[Florence County, South Carolina|Florence]] |government_type = |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_date = |area_magnitude = 1 E8 |area_total_km2 = 8.9 |area_land_km2 = 8.9 |area_water_km2 = 0.0 |population_as_of = 2000 |population_total = 650 |population_density_km2 = 73.4 |timezone = [[Eastern Standard Time Zone|EST]] |utc_offset = -5 |elevation_ft = 82 |coordinates_display = display=inline,title |latd = 33 |latm = 58 |lats = 32 |latNS = N |longd = 79 |longm = 44 |longs = 50 |longEW = W |area_total_sq_mi = 3.4 |area_land_sq_mi = 3.4 |area_water_sq_mi = 0.0 |elevation_m = 25 |website = |timezone_DST = EDT |utc_offset_DST = -4 |postal_code_type = [[ZIP code]] |postal_code = 29530 |area_code = [[Area code 843|843]] |blank_name = [[Federal Information Processing Standard|FIPS code]] |blank_info = 45-17215{{GR|2}} |blank1_name = [[Geographic Names Information System|GNIS]] feature ID |blank1_info = 1247407{{GR|3}} |footnotes = }} '''Coward''' is a town in [[Florence County, South Carolina|Florence County]], [[South Carolina]], [[United States]]. The population was 650 at the [[United States Census, 2000|2000 census]]. It is part of the [[Florence, South Carolina|Florence]] [[Florence, South Carolina metropolitan area|Metropolitan Statistical Area]]. ==Geography== Coward is located at {{coord|33.975560|-79.747097|type:city_region:US|format=dms|display=inline}}.{{GR|1}} According to the [[United States Census Bureau]], the town has a total area of {{convert|3.4|sqmi|km2}}, of which, {{convert|3.4|sqmi|km2}} of it is land and 0.29% is water. ==Demographics== As of the [[census]]{{GR|2}} of 2000, there were 650 people, 246 households, and 178 families residing in the town. The [[population density]] was 189.9 people per square mile (73.4/km<sup>2</sup>). There were 263 housing units at an average density of 76.8 per square mile (29.7/km<sup>2</sup>). The racial makeup of the town was 84.15% [[White (U.S. Census)|White]], 14.00% [[African American (U.S. Census)|African American]], 0.15% [[Asian (U.S. Census)|Asian]], 0.62% from [[Race (United States Census)|other races]], and 1.08% from two or more races. [[Hispanic (U.S. Census)|Hispanic]] or [[Latino (U.S. Census)|Latino]] of any race were 1.38% of the population. There were 246 households out of which 32.9% had children under the age of 18 living with them, 56.1% were [[Marriage|married couples]] living together, 12.2% had a female householder with no husband present, and 27.6% were non-families. 24.8% of all households were made up of individuals and 8.1% had someone living alone who was 65 years of age or older. The average household size was 2.64 and the average family size was 3.17. In the town the population was spread out with 26.2% under the age of 18, 9.7% from 18 to 24, 28.8% from 25 to 44, 25.5% from 45 to 64, and 9.8% who were 65 years of age or older. The median age was 35 years. For every 100 females there were 98.8 males. For every 100 females age 18 and over, there were 94.3 males. The median income for a household in the town was $28,182, and the median income for a family was $30,208. Males had a median income of $28,977 versus $17,039 for females. The [[per capita income]] for the town was $12,711. About 16.1% of families and 24.4% of the population were below the [[poverty line]], including 37.2% of those under age 18 and 43.2% of those age 65 or over. ==References== {{reflist}} {{Florence County, South Carolina}} [[Category:Populated places in Florence County, South Carolina]] [[Category:Towns in South Carolina]] [[Category:Florence, South Carolina metropolitan area]]
